## Testes

```bash
>>>>>>>>
1
========
[2]
<<<<<<<<

>>>>>>>>
2
========
[2, 3]
<<<<<<<<

>>>>>>>>
3
========
[2, 3, 5]
<<<<<<<<<

>>>>>>>>
7
========
[2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13, 17]
<<<<<<<<<
```
